mapper.insert: insert into employers( employer_seq, employer_id, employer_pw, employer_name, employer_number, employer_address, employer_field, owner_name, owner_phone, employer_homepage) values( s_employer_seq.nextval, #{employerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerPw, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{employerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employerField, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerPhone}, jdbcType=VARCHAR, #{employerHomePage, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from employers where employer_id= #{employerId} AND employer_pw = #{employerPw}

select count(*) from hired_history hi, employees em1, employers em2, RECRUITMENTS re where hi.EMPLOYEE_SEQ = em1.EMPLOYEE_SEQ and hi.RECRUITMENT_SEQ = re.RECRUITMENT_SEQ and re.EMPLOYER_SEQ = em2.EMPLOYER_SEQ and em1.employee_gender='man' and em2.EMPLOYER_SEQ = #{seq}

select count(*) from hired_history hi, employees em1, employers em2, RECRUITMENTS re where hi.EMPLOYEE_SEQ = em1.EMPLOYEE_SEQ and hi.RECRUITMENT_SEQ = re.RECRUITMENT_SEQ and re.EMPLOYER_SEQ = em2.EMPLOYER_SEQ and em1.employee_gender='woman' and em2.EMPLOYER_SEQ = #{seq}

select * from hired_history hi, employees em1, employers em2, RECRUITMENTS re, MARKER_LOCATION ma where hi.EMPLOYEE_SEQ = em1.EMPLOYEE_SEQ and hi.RECRUITMENT_SEQ = re.RECRUITMENT_SEQ and re.EMPLOYER_SEQ = em2.EMPLOYER_SEQ and ma.ROAD_ADDRESS = em1.EMPLOYEE_ADDRESS and em2.EMPLOYER_SEQ = #{seq}
